original_text: So Jonah went out of the city, and sat on the east side of the city, and there made him a booth, and sat under it in the shadow, till he might see what would become of the city.
korean_text: 요나가 성읍에서 나가서 그 성읍 동쪽에 앉아 거기서 자기를 위하여 초막을 짓고 그 성읍에 무슨 일이 일어나는가를 보려고 그 그늘 아래에 앉았더라

sentences.original_text: So Jonah went out of the city
and sat on the east side of the city
and there made him a booth
and sat under it in the shadow
till he might see what would become of the city
sentences.korean_translation: 성에 무슨 일이 일어날까를 보기를 기다리더라
